name: Best education from nursery to twelfth grade
description:
Schools in Jalandhar


The young minds need optimum attention and care then only they will become a successful doctor, engineer, astronaut, manager, or any other professional. In order to fulfil this purpose, we LBS are here as one of the most celebrated Schools in Jalandhar. At LBS we have a Football Ground, Basketball Court, Yoga Hall, Cricket Ground, Chess Hall, Table Tennis Hall, Lawn Tennis Court, Martial Arts Hall, Volleyball Court, and Skating Court to ensure a comprehensive education of kids from nursery to the twelfth grade and establish as the number one Schools in Jalandhar since years and shall continue this legacy in future as well.
